Description: Laureate headed bust of Hadrian, right, draped. (obverse)
Alexandria, draped, reclining left, holding corn-ears in right hand and vine-branch in left, resting left arm on basket of fruit: to left, three corn-ears growing. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: RE3 / Coins of the Roman Empire in the British Museum, vol.III: Nerva to Hadrian (1716, p.507)
Strack (Hadrian) / Die Reichspraegung zur Zeit des Hadrian (711)
RIC2 / The Roman imperial coinage, vol. 2: Vespasian to Hadrian (843, p.446)
RIC2.3 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. II - part 3 from AD 117-138 Hadrian (1620)
